and TROPOMI datasets used here. We thank L. Oman for helping to set up the GEOS-GMI

availability: All satellite data used in this work are publicly available through NASA Goddard

policy response data are available upon request from the authors as is code to process all
datasets. All data needed to evaluate the conclusions in the paper are present in the paper
and/or the Supplementary Materials. Additional data related to this paper may be requested
from the authors.
